defaultData.description: This description is Legend, wait for it, Dary! Legendary!

fileSets.description: Performance script which creates resources in Velocity and returns execution time and system performance

parameters.name: velo
parameters.description: ONLY VM name -> Without .spirenteng.com. Target Velocity to run performance

parameters.name: resources
parameters.description: Number of resources to create. NrOfRes = topologies + 5*subtopologies

parameters.name: abstractResources
parameters.description: Number of abstract resources to create.

parameters.name: topologies
parameters.description: Number of topologies with 1 resource to create

parameters.name: subtopologies
parameters.description: Number of 5 layer subtopologies to create

parameters.name: portGroupsResources
parameters.description: Number of resources with connected port groups to create

parameters.name: vsphereClouds
parameters.description: Number of vSphere Clouds to create

parameters.name: openstackClouds
parameters.description: Number of OpenStack clouds to create

parameters.name: Abstract_Topology
parameters.description: Path to abstract topology file

parameters.name: LayerTopology
parameters.description: Path to abstract topology file

fileSets.description: Send mail with execution result and details
Send mail with execution result and details

parameters.name: agent
parameters.description: Agent to set up for performance automation

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: Username of the agent to set up

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Password of the agent to set up

fileSets.description: Script receives number of users to create, login and logout.Each thread creates number of given users

parameters.name: velo
parameters.description: ONLY VM name -> Without .spirenteng.com. Target Velocity to run login/logout

parameters.name: ite
parameters.description: ONLY VM name -> Without .spirenteng.com. Target ITE to create users

parameters.name: users
parameters.description: Number of users for each thread to create and authenticate

parameters.name: threads
parameters.description: Number of threads

fileSets.description: Script changes to last or given build a vel / ite / agent vm

parameters.name: vcenter
parameters.description: Full name of vCenter instance

parameters.name: vel
parameters.description: Name of Velocity vm

parameters.name: velbuild
parameters.description: Velocity Build number

parameters.name: ite
parameters.description: Ite Vm name

parameters.name: itebuild
parameters.description: ITE build number

parameters.name: agent
parameters.description: Vel Agent vm name

parameters.name: agentbuild
parameters.description: Vel Agent build number

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Release version

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: Vcenter username

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: vcenter password
